content.body: I'm abso going to block any attempt to make the topic sigil `#` if it means we can't do array access. It would be a huge mistake regardless of if there are (longer) alternatives (for some cases). But we're not even putting that forward as an option right now, last I saw jschoi's slides, so it's not a relevant topic anyway.
